text: Androula Yiakoumetti is a Cypriot dialectologist based at the University of Cambridge. Her research focuses on Greek language and socio-cultural factors that influence language acquisition. ==See also== * Bidialectism ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Academics of the University of Cambridge Category:Cypriot academics Category:Cypriot social scientists Category:Dialectologists Category:Hellenists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Androula Yiakoumetti
